item.title: Cirriculum Vitae
item.description: Cirriculum Vitae Download my complete curriculum vitae here. Current Academic Appointments 2023 - present, Wieler Family Associate Professor (with tenure) of Economics, Boston College, Chestnut Hill, MA USA 2024 - present, Research Associate, National Bureau of Economic Research. Previous Academic Positions 2020 - 2023, Wieler Family Assistant Professor of Economics in the Morrissey College of Arts and Sciences, Boston College, Chestnut Hill, MA USA 2018 - 2023, Assistant Professor of Economics, Boston College, Chestnut Hill, MA USA

item.title: Contact
item.description: Email charles.murry@bc.edu Mailing Address 324 Maloney Hall Boston College Chestnut Hill, MA 02467

item.title: Research
item.description: Publications and Accepted Manuscripts The Evolution of Market Power in the US Automobile Industry (with Paul Grieco and Ali Yurukoglu) The Quarterly Journal of Economics Volume 139, Issue 2, May 2024, Pages 1201â€“1253. https://doi.org/10.1093/qje/qjad047 appendix –replication package– Inventory Management in Decentralized Markets (with Fei Li, Can Tian, and Yiyi Zhou) International Economic Review Volume 65, Issue 1 (2024): 431-470. https://doi.org/10.1111/iere.12669 Price Discrimination in International Airline Markets
